title: Shirley Birthday, Kim K, Junior Sports Talk, Stimulus Checks and more.
itunes:title: Shirley Birthday, Kim K, Junior Sports Talk, Stimulus Checks and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve's official anthem is the new song Try Jesus PLEASE Don't Try Me. Happy Birthday to our very own Shirley Strawberry!!! The Chief Love Officer offers his thoughts on a situation that involves a racist mother. Kim Kardashian is in Wyoming with Kanye for the first time since his meltdown. Junior has a special birthday poem for Shirley. Congressman John Lewis was honored at the U.S. capitol. Junior talks about the beef between Mike Tyson and Don King. Another stimulus check is on the horizon. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve gives a friendly reminder to get it into gear and why as we are 99 days away from the Presidential election.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
